verses.verse: Do we <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G4921>commend<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves?<s%> <S%G1508>or<s%> <S%G5535>need<s%> we, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> others, <S%G1992>epistles<s%> of <S%G4956>commendation<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> letters of <S%G4956>commendation<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G5216>you?<s%>

Forasmuch as ye are manifestly <S%G5319>declared<s%> <S%G3754>to<s%> <S%G2075>be<s%> the <S%G1992>epistle<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G1449>written<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> with <S%G3188>ink,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> with the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4109>tables<s%> of <S%G3035>stone,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4560>fleshy<s%> <S%G4109>tables<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> hath made us <S%G2427>able<s%> <S%G2248><s%> <S%G1249>ministers<s%> of the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament;<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> of the <S%G1121>letter,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> of the <S%G4151>spirit:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1121>letter<s%> <S%G615>killeth,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> giveth <S%G2227>life.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G1722>written<s%> <S%G1121><s%> and <S%G1795>engraven<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3037>stones,<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>glorious,<s%> <S%G1391><s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G816>steadfastly<s%> <S%G1519>behold<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>countenance;<s%> which glory was to be done away: <S%G2673><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> that which was made <S%G1392>glorious<s%> had no <S%G1392>glory<s%> <S%G3761><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>respect,<s%> by reason <S%G1752>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G5235>excelleth.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> that which is done <S%G2673>away<s%> was <S%G1223>glorious,<s%> <S%G1391><s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> that which <S%G3306>remaineth<s%> is <S%G1722>glorious.<s%> <S%G1391><s%>
Seeing <S%G3767>then<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1680>hope,<s%> we <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> plainness of speech: <S%G3954><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> which <S%G5087>put<s%> a <S%G2571>veil<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G4383>face,<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> could <S%G3361>not<s%> steadfastly <S%G816>look<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> of that which is abolished: <S%G2673><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3540>minds<s%> were <S%G4456>blinded:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G3306>remaineth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2571>veil<s%> untaken <S%G343>away<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G320>reading<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G1242>testament;<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> veil is done <S%G2673>away<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
Nevertheless <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2259>when<s%> <S%G302><s%> it shall <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2571>veil<s%> shall be taken <S%G4014>away.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> that <S%G4151>Spirit:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is, <S%G1563>there<s%> is <S%G1657>liberty.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> with <S%G343>open<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> beholding as in a <S%G2734>glass<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> are <S%G3339>changed<s%> into <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> even <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
